### **8. backend/src/main/java/com/payment/service/ValidationService.java**
```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

### **8. backend/src/main/java/com/payment/service/ValidationService.java**
```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

### **8. backend/src/main/java/com/payment/service/ValidationService.java**
```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

        payment.setName(request.getName().trim());
        payment.setEmail(request.getEmail().trim());
        payment.setContact(request.getContact().trim());
        payment.setAmount(new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim()));
        payment.setStatus("success");

        PaymentResponse response = new PaymentResponse();

        data.setEmail(savedPayment.getEmail());

        data.setStatus(savedPayment.getStatus());
        response.setData(data);
        
        return response;
    }

        return paymentRepository.findAll();
    }

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import com.payment.dto.PaymentResponse;
import com.payment.entity.Payment;
import com.payment.repository.PaymentRepository;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.List;

@Service
public class PaymentService {
    
    @Autowired
    private PaymentRepository paymentRepository;
    
    public PaymentResponse processPayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Payment payment = new Payment();
        payment.setName(request.getName().trim());
        payment.setEmail(request.getEmail().trim());
        payment.setContact(request.getContact().trim());
        payment.setAmount(new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim()));
        payment.setStatus("success");
        
        Payment savedPayment = paymentRepository.save(payment);
        
        PaymentResponse response = new PaymentResponse();
        response.setSuccess(true);
        response.setMessage("Payment processed successfully");
        response.setPaymentId(savedPayment.getId());
        
        PaymentResponse.PaymentData data = new PaymentResponse.PaymentData();
        data.setName(savedPayment.getName());
        data.setEmail(savedPayment.getEmail());
        data.setAmount(savedPayment.getAmount());
        data.setStatus(savedPayment.getStatus());
        response.setData(data);
        
        return response;
    }
    
    public List<Payment> getAllPayments() {
        return paymentRepository.findAll();
    }
}

import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}

    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}

    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}

    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;

        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places

                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");

                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {

                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }

        return errors;
    }

            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());

package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

### **8. backend/src/main/java/com/payment/service/ValidationService.java**
```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

### **8. backend/src/main/java/com/payment/service/ValidationService.java**
```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

```java
package com.payment.service;

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.regex.Pattern;

@Service
public class ValidationService {
    
    private static final String EMAIL_REGEX = "^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@(.+)$";
    private static final String NAME_REGEX = "^[a-zA-Z\\s]{3,50}$";
    private static final String CONTACT_REGEX = "^\\d{10}$";
    private static final BigDecimal MIN_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("1.00");
    private static final BigDecimal MAX_AMOUNT = new BigDecimal("100000.00");
    
    public Map<String, String> validatePayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();
        
        // Validate Name
        if (request.getName() == null || request.getName().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("name", "Name is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(NAME_REGEX, request.getName().trim())) {
            errors.put("name", "Name must be 3-50 characters, alphabets and spaces only");
        }
        
        // Validate Email
        if (request.getEmail() == null || request.getEmail().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("email", "Email is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(EMAIL_REGEX, request.getEmail().trim())) {
            errors.put("email", "Invalid email format");
        }
        
        // Validate Contact
        if (request.getContact() == null || request.getContact().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact number is required");
        } else if (!Pattern.matches(CONTACT_REGEX, request.getContact().trim())) {
            errors.put("contact", "Contact must be exactly 10 digits");
        }
        
        // Validate Amount
        if (request.getAmount() == null || request.getAmount().trim().isEmpty()) {
            errors.put("amount", "Amount is required");
        } else {
            try {
                BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim());
                
                // Check decimal places
                if (amount.scale() != 2 && amount.scale() > 2) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must have exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., 100.00)");
                }
                
                // Check range
                if (amount.compareTo(MIN_AMOUNT) < 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be minimum ₹1.00");
                } else if (amount.compareTo(MAX_AMOUNT) > 0) {
                    errors.put("amount", "Amount must be maximum ₹100,000.00");
                }
            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                errors.put("amount", "Amount must be in format 100.00");
            }
        }
        
        return errors;
    }
}
```

import com.payment.dto.PaymentRequest;
import com.payment.dto.PaymentResponse;
import com.payment.entity.Payment;
import com.payment.repository.PaymentRepository;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.List;

@Service
public class PaymentService {
    
    @Autowired
    private PaymentRepository paymentRepository;
    
    public PaymentResponse processPayment(PaymentRequest request) {
        Payment payment = new Payment();
        payment.setName(request.getName().trim());
        payment.setEmail(request.getEmail().trim());
        payment.setContact(request.getContact().trim());
        payment.setAmount(new BigDecimal(request.getAmount().trim()));
        payment.setStatus("success");
        
        Payment savedPayment = paymentRepository.save(payment);
        
        PaymentResponse response = new PaymentResponse();
        response.setSuccess(true);
        response.setMessage("Payment processed successfully");
        response.setPaymentId(savedPayment.getId());
        
        PaymentResponse.PaymentData data = new PaymentResponse.PaymentData();
        data.setName(savedPayment.getName());
        data.setEmail(savedPayment.getEmail());
        data.setAmount(savedPayment.getAmount());
        data.setStatus(savedPayment.getStatus());
        response.setData(data);
        
        return response;
    }
    
    public List<Payment> getAllPayments() {
        return paymentRepository.findAll();
    }
}
